sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { GraduationCap, FileText, Upload, Users, CheckCircle, Clock, XCircle, BarChart2 } from 'lucide-react'; const InstituteDashboard: React.FC = () => { // Mock data const stats = [ { name: 'Total Students', value: '2,456', icon: Users, change: '+8.5% from last semester' }, { name: 'Certificates Issued', value: '1,845', icon: FileText, change: '15% increase' }, { name: 'Pending Approvals', value: '32', icon: Clock, change: '5 new today' }, { name: 'Verification Rate', value: '98.7%', icon: CheckCircle, change: '0.3% increase' }, ]; const recentCertificates = [ { id: 1, student: 'John Doe', course: 'B.Tech CSE', date: '2023-05-15', status: 'verified' }, { id: 2, student: 'Jane Smith', course: 'MBA', date: '2023-05-14', status: 'pending' }, { id: 3, student: 'Robert Johnson', course: 'B.Arch', date: '2023-05-13', status: 'verified' }, { id: 4, student: 'Emily Davis', course: 'BBA', date: '2023-05-12', status: 'rejected' }, ]; return (

Institute Dashboard

Manage your institution's certificates and student records

{/* Stats */}
{stats.map((stat) => (
{stat.name}
{stat.value}
{stat.change}
))}
{/* Recent Certificates */}

Recent Certificates

{recentCertificates.map((cert) => ( ))}
Student Course Date Status
{cert.student} {cert.course} {cert.date} {cert.status === 'verified' && ( Verified )} {cert.status === 'pending' && ( Pending )} {cert.status === 'rejected' && ( Rejected )}
View all certificates
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Verification Status

87% Verified 13% Pending
); }; export default InstituteDashboard;
